Method Detail

setReusePort

public static void setReusePort(java.net.DatagramSocket sock,
                                boolean reuse)
                         throws java.net.SocketException
Enable/disable the SO_REUSEPORT, or alternatively, the SO_REUSEADDR socket option. For UDP sockets it may be necessary to bind more than one socket to the same socket address and port. This is typically for the purpose of receiving broadcast packets. This option must be enabled prior to binding the socket.

Parameters:
sock - the socket.
reuse - whether to enable or disable this option.
Throws:
java.net.SocketException - if an error occurs enabling or disabling the SO_REUSEPORT socket option, or the socket is closed.
